n1.title: FlowTech Introduces New Educational Wind Tunnel
n1.summary: FlowTech has presented an updated version of the aerodynamic wind tunnel for educational institutions with an expanded set of models.

n2.title: Partnership with Leading Russian Universities
n2.summary: FlowTech has signed cooperation agreements with several technical universities to integrate wind tunnels into the curriculum.

n3.title: Participation in 'Technologies of the Future' Exhibition
n3.summary: The FlowTech team demonstrated the capabilities of the wind tunnel at an international exhibition of innovative technologies.

n4.title: FASIE Foundation Support Received
n4.summary: The FlowTech project received grant support under the Student Startup program for further development.
